name: CanvasGradient
desc: CanvasGradient instances define visual gradients that can be displayed on the HTML canvas element. The CanvasRenderingContext2D properties fillStyle and strokeStyle can be set to a CanvasGradient object. You obtain a CanvasGradient instance by calling one of the gradient creation methods of the CanvasRenderingContext2D classâ€”createLinearGradient() or createRadialGradient().
